verses.text: \w In|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w first|strong="H2298"\w* \w year|strong="H8140"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w reign|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w Belshazzar|strong="H1113"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* Babylon, \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w visions|strong="H2376"\w* passed through \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w mind|strong="H7217"\w* as \w he|strong="H1841"\w* lay \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w bed|strong="H4903"\w*. \w He|strong="H1841"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3790"\w* \w down|strong="H3790"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w this|strong="H5922"\w* \w is|strong="H4406"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w summary|strong="H7217"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w account|strong="H5922"\w*.

\w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* declared: “\w In|strong="H7229"\w* my \w vision|strong="H2376"\w* \w in|strong="H7229"\w* \w the|strong="H2370"\w* \w night|strong="H3916"\w* I looked, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* suddenly \w the|strong="H2370"\w* four \w winds|strong="H7308"\w* \w of|strong="H7308"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* \w were|strong="H1934"\w* churning \w up|strong="H1934"\w* \w the|strong="H2370"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w sea|strong="H3221"\w*.\f + \fr 7:2 \ft Perhaps the Great Sea, that is, the Mediterranean Sea\f*

Then four \w great|strong="H7260"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w* \w came|strong="H5559"\w* \w up|strong="H5559"\w* out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w sea|strong="H3221"\w*, each \w one|strong="H1668"\w* \w different|strong="H8133"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* others:

The first beast was like a lion, and it had the wings of an eagle. I watched until its wings were torn off and it was lifted up from the ground and made to stand on two feet like a man, and given the mind of a man.

Suddenly another beast appeared, which looked like a bear. It was raised up on one of its sides, and it had three ribs in its mouth between its teeth. So it was told, ‘Get up and gorge yourself on flesh!’
Next, as I watched, another beast appeared. It was like a leopard, and on its back it had four wings like those of a bird. The beast also had four heads, and it was given authority to rule.

After this, as I watched in my vision in the night, suddenly a fourth beast appeared, and it was terrifying—dreadful and extremely strong—with large iron teeth. It devoured and crushed; then it trampled underfoot whatever was left. It was different from all the beasts before it, and it had ten horns.

While I was contemplating the horns, suddenly another horn, a little one, came up among them, and three of the first horns were uprooted before it. This horn had eyes like those of a man and a mouth that spoke words of arrogance. Daniel’s Vision of the Ancient of Days

\w As|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w continued|strong="H1934"\w* \w to|strong="H5705"\w* watch, \w thrones|strong="H3764"\w* \w were|strong="H1934"\w* \w set|strong="H3488"\w* \w in|strong="H3488"\w* \w place|strong="H1934"\w*, \w and|strong="H1934"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w Ancient|strong="H6268"\w* \w of|strong="H6268"\w* \w Days|strong="H3118"\w* \w took|strong="H3488"\w* \w His|strong="H5705"\w* \w seat|strong="H3488"\w*. \w His|strong="H5705"\w* clothing \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w white|strong="H2358"\w* \w as|strong="H1768"\w* \w snow|strong="H8517"\w*, \w and|strong="H1934"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w hair|strong="H8177"\w* \w of|strong="H6268"\w* \w His|strong="H5705"\w* \w head|strong="H7217"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w like|strong="H7217"\w* \w pure|strong="H5343"\w* \w wool|strong="H6015"\w*. \w His|strong="H5705"\w* \w throne|strong="H3764"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* flaming \w with|strong="H7631"\w* \w fire|strong="H5135"\w*, \w and|strong="H1934"\w* \w its|strong="H5705"\w* \w wheels|strong="H1535"\w* \w were|strong="H1934"\w* all \w ablaze|strong="H7631"\w*.

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w fire|strong="H5135"\w* \w was|strong="H1780"\w* \w flowing|strong="H5047"\w*, \w coming|strong="H5312"\w* \w out|strong="H5312"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w His|strong="H6925"\w* \w presence|strong="H6925"\w*. Thousands \w upon|strong="H7240"\w* thousands attended \w Him|strong="H4481"\w*, \w and|strong="H5609"\w* \w myriads|strong="H7240"\w* \w upon|strong="H7240"\w* \w myriads|strong="H7240"\w* \w stood|strong="H6966"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w Him|strong="H4481"\w*. \w The|strong="H4481"\w* \w court|strong="H1780"\w* \w was|strong="H1780"\w* \w convened|strong="H3488"\w*, \w and|strong="H5609"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w books|strong="H5609"\w* \w were|strong="H1768"\w* \w opened|strong="H6606"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w kept|strong="H1934"\w* \w watching|strong="H2370"\w* \w because|strong="H4481"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w arrogant|strong="H7260"\w* \w words|strong="H4406"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w horn|strong="H7162"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w speaking|strong="H4449"\w*. \w As|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w continued|strong="H1934"\w* \w to|strong="H5705"\w* watch, \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w beast|strong="H2423"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w slain|strong="H6992"\w*, \w and|strong="H1934"\w* \w its|strong="H5705"\w* \w body|strong="H1655"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* destroyed \w and|strong="H1934"\w* thrown into \w the|strong="H4481"\w* blazing fire.

\w As|strong="H5705"\w* \w for|strong="H5705"\w* \w the|strong="H5705"\w* \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* \w of|strong="H7606"\w* \w the|strong="H5705"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w*, \w their|strong="H3052"\w* \w dominion|strong="H7985"\w* \w was|strong="H7985"\w* \w removed|strong="H5709"\w*, but they \w were|strong="H2417"\w* \w granted|strong="H3052"\w* \w an|strong="H5705"\w* extension \w of|strong="H7606"\w* \w life|strong="H2417"\w* \w for|strong="H5705"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w season|strong="H2166"\w* \w and|strong="H2166"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H5732"\w*. Daniel’s Vision of the Son of Man

In my \w vision|strong="H2376"\w* in \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w night|strong="H3916"\w* I \w continued|strong="H1934"\w* \w to|strong="H6925"\w* watch, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* I \w saw|strong="H2370"\w* One \w like|strong="H5974"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w Son|strong="H1247"\w* \w of|strong="H1247"\w* Man \f + \fr 7:13 \ft Or one like a son of man\f* coming \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w clouds|strong="H6050"\w* \w of|strong="H1247"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*.\f + \fr 7:13 \ft See Matthew 24:30, Matthew 26:64, Mark 13:26, Mark 14:62, Luke 21:27, Revelation 1:13, and Revelation 14:14.\f* \w He|strong="H5705"\w* \w approached|strong="H7127"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w Ancient|strong="H6268"\w* \w of|strong="H1247"\w* \w Days|strong="H3118"\w* \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* led into \w His|strong="H6925"\w* \w presence|strong="H6925"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4437"\w* \w He|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H7985"\w* \w given|strong="H3052"\w* \w dominion|strong="H7985"\w*, \w glory|strong="H3367"\w*, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* kingship, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w every|strong="H3606"\w* nation \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w language|strong="H3961"\w* should \w serve|strong="H6399"\w* \w Him|strong="H3052"\w*. \w His|strong="H5709"\w* \w dominion|strong="H7985"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w an|strong="H3606"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5957"\w* \w dominion|strong="H7985"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w pass|strong="H3809"\w* \w away|strong="H5709"\w*, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w His|strong="H5709"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* one \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w never|strong="H5957"\w* \w be|strong="H3809"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H2255"\w*. Daniel’s Visions Interpreted

I, \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, \w was|strong="H1841"\w* \w grieved|strong="H3735"\w* \w in|strong="H1841"\w* my \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w*, \w and|strong="H1841"\w* the \w visions|strong="H2376"\w* \w in|strong="H1841"\w* my \w mind|strong="H7217"\w* alarmed me.

\w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w approached|strong="H7127"\w* \w one|strong="H2298"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* those who were \w standing|strong="H6966"\w* there, \w and|strong="H1156"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w asked|strong="H1156"\w* \w him|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w true|strong="H3330"\w* \w meaning|strong="H3330"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w*. \w So|strong="H4481"\w* he told \w me|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w these|strong="H1836"\w* \w things|strong="H4406"\w*:

‘\w These|strong="H4481"\w* four \w great|strong="H7260"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* four \w kings|strong="H4430"\w* \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w arise|strong="H6966"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* earth.

But \w the|strong="H5705"\w* \w saints|strong="H6922"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H5705"\w* Most \w High|strong="H5946"\w* \w will|strong="H5946"\w* \w receive|strong="H6902"\w* \w the|strong="H5705"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w possess|strong="H2631"\w* it \w forever|strong="H5957"\w*—yes, \w forever|strong="H5957"\w* \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w ever|strong="H5957"\w*.’

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* wanted \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w know|strong="H3321"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* true \w meaning|strong="H3321"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7244"\w* \w beast|strong="H2423"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w different|strong="H8133"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* others—\w extremely|strong="H3493"\w* terrifying—devouring \w and|strong="H6523"\w* crushing \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w iron|strong="H6523"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8128"\w* \w and|strong="H6523"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5174"\w* \w claws|strong="H2953"\w*, \w then|strong="H1768"\w* trampling underfoot \w whatever|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* left.

\w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w also|strong="H4481"\w* wanted \w to|strong="H5922"\w* know \w about|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w ten|strong="H6236"\w* \w horns|strong="H7162"\w* \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w its|strong="H4481"\w* \w head|strong="H7217"\w* \w and|strong="H5308"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* other \w horn|strong="H7162"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w came|strong="H5559"\w* \w up|strong="H5559"\w*, \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w three|strong="H8532"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w them|strong="H5922"\w* \w fell|strong="H5308"\w*—\w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w horn|strong="H7162"\w* \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* \w appearance|strong="H2376"\w* \w was|strong="H7162"\w* \w more|strong="H5922"\w* imposing \w than|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* others, \w with|strong="H5922"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5870"\w* \w and|strong="H5308"\w* \w with|strong="H5922"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6433"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w spoke|strong="H4449"\w* words \w of|strong="H4481"\w* arrogance.

As I watched, \w this|strong="H1797"\w* \w horn|strong="H7162"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w waging|strong="H5648"\w* \w war|strong="H7129"\w* \w against|strong="H5974"\w* \w the|strong="H5974"\w* \w saints|strong="H6922"\w* \w and|strong="H1934"\w* prevailing \w against|strong="H5974"\w* \w them|strong="H3202"\w*,

\w until|strong="H5705"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w Ancient|strong="H6268"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w Days|strong="H3118"\w* \w arrived|strong="H4291"\w* \w and|strong="H4437"\w* pronounced \w judgment|strong="H1780"\w* \w in|strong="H4437"\w* favor \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w saints|strong="H6922"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* Most \w High|strong="H5946"\w*, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w time|strong="H2166"\w* \w came|strong="H4291"\w* \w for|strong="H5705"\w* \w them|strong="H3052"\w* \w to|strong="H5705"\w* \w possess|strong="H2631"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*.

\w This|strong="H3606"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w what|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* said: ‘\w The|strong="H3606"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7244"\w* \w beast|strong="H2423"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7244"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* appear on \w the|strong="H3606"\w* earth, \w different|strong="H8133"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* other \w kingdoms|strong="H4437"\w*, \w and|strong="H1855"\w* \w it|strong="H1934"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* devour \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w whole|strong="H3606"\w* earth, trample \w it|strong="H1934"\w* \w down|strong="H1759"\w*, \w and|strong="H1855"\w* \w crush|strong="H1855"\w* \w it|strong="H1934"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w ten|strong="H6236"\w* \w horns|strong="H7162"\w* \w are|strong="H1932"\w* \w ten|strong="H6236"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w* who \w will|strong="H1932"\w* \w rise|strong="H6966"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w this|strong="H1932"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*. \w After|strong="H4481"\w* them another \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w different|strong="H8133"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* earlier \w ones|strong="H6933"\w*, \w will|strong="H1932"\w* \w rise|strong="H6966"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w subdue|strong="H8214"\w* \w three|strong="H8532"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5705"\w* \w will|strong="H5732"\w* \w speak|strong="H4449"\w* \w out|strong="H1080"\w* \w against|strong="H6655"\w* \w the|strong="H5705"\w* \w Most|strong="H5943"\w* \w High|strong="H5943"\w* \w and|strong="H5943"\w* oppress \w the|strong="H5705"\w* \w saints|strong="H6922"\w* \w of|strong="H3028"\w* \w the|strong="H5705"\w* \w Most|strong="H5943"\w* \w High|strong="H5943"\w*, intending \w to|strong="H5705"\w* \w change|strong="H8133"\w* \w the|strong="H5705"\w* \w appointed|strong="H2166"\w* \w times|strong="H5732"\w* \w and|strong="H5943"\w* \w laws|strong="H1882"\w*; \w and|strong="H5943"\w* \w the|strong="H5705"\w* \w saints|strong="H6922"\w* \w will|strong="H5732"\w* \w be|strong="H5732"\w* \w given|strong="H3052"\w* into \w his|strong="H5705"\w* \w hand|strong="H3028"\w* \w for|strong="H5705"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H5732"\w*, \w and|strong="H5943"\w* \w times|strong="H5732"\w*, \w and|strong="H5943"\w* \w half|strong="H6387"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H5732"\w*.

But \w the|strong="H5705"\w* \w court|strong="H1780"\w* \w will|strong="H7985"\w* convene, \w and|strong="H5705"\w* \w his|strong="H5709"\w* \w dominion|strong="H7985"\w* \w will|strong="H7985"\w* \w be|strong="H1780"\w* \w taken|strong="H5709"\w* \w away|strong="H5709"\w* \w and|strong="H5705"\w* completely \w destroyed|strong="H8046"\w* \w forever|strong="H5491"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w sovereignty|strong="H4437"\w*, \w dominion|strong="H7985"\w*, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w greatness|strong="H7238"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4437"\w* \w under|strong="H8460"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w be|strong="H5957"\w* \w given|strong="H3052"\w* \w to|strong="H3052"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w*, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w saints|strong="H6922"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* Most \w High|strong="H5946"\w*. \w His|strong="H3606"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w be|strong="H5957"\w* \w an|strong="H3606"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5957"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* rulers \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w serve|strong="H6399"\w* \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w obey|strong="H8086"\w* \w Him|strong="H3052"\w*.’

Thus ends \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w matter|strong="H4406"\w*. \w As|strong="H1768"\w* \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w me|strong="H5922"\w*, \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, \w my|strong="H5922"\w* \w thoughts|strong="H7476"\w* troubled \w me|strong="H5922"\w* \w greatly|strong="H7690"\w*, \w and|strong="H1841"\w* \w my|strong="H5922"\w* \w face|strong="H2122"\w* turned \w pale|strong="H8133"\w*. \w But|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w kept|strong="H5202"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w matter|strong="H4406"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w myself|strong="H3821"\w*.”
